scripts.test:build: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.clean:full: powershell -Command "Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules/.cache -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .turbopack -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue"
scripts.dev:clean: npm run clean:full && npm run dev
scripts.dev:fresh: npm run clean:full && timeout /t 2 && npm run dev
scripts.build:clean: npm run clean:full && npm run build
scripts.reset:dev: powershell -Command "Write-Host 'Clearing all caches and restarting...'; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .next -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force node_modules/.cache -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue; Remove-Item -Recurse -Force .turbopack -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue" && npm run dev
